entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
